document.full_text: the early prison release on friday of a man who fatally shot a high school valedictorian has prompted a public outcry and plans for protests against mississippi's sentencing laws.
document.title: early release of prisoner sparks mississippi outrage
lines_and_colors: the early prison release on friday of a man who fatally shot a high school valedictorian has prompted a public outcry and plans for protests against mississippi's sentencing laws.
